thread.title: Ignited Wins U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission Public Service Contract
thread.title_full: Ignited Wins U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission Public Service Contract

author: Victoria Lo
title: Ignited Wins U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission Public Service Contract
text:
Ignited, an independent full-service advertising agency located in El Segundo, CA, has been awarded a contract from the U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission (SEC) to provide technical and professional services for an integrated marketing, education, and information dissemination campaign. In collaboration with the SECâ€™s Office of Investor Education & Advocacy (OIEA), Ignited will develop an integrated public service campaign which may include TV, radio, print and digital aimed at educating audiences in ways to avoid investment fraud, make more informed investing decisions, and encourage investors to use the free tools and resources provided by the SEC to make informed financial decisions prior to investing.
Services under the up to five year contract also include media planning and buying and social media strategy.
The public service campaign is expected to launch in early 2016.
About Ignited
Founded in 1999, Ignited ( http://www.ignitedusa.com ) is an independent advertising agency providing integrated strategic planning, creative, digital, experiential, media planning and buying and social media services. For over 14 years, Ignited has been an advertising and marketing partner to state and federal government agencies.
